text: hi guys I'm Laura Vitale and on this
episode of Laura in the kitchen I want
to show you sort of my take on huevos
rancheros which is like eggs that are
cooked in a really lovely spicy sauce
and served with corn tortillas and
whatever toppings you like
so let me want you to your ingredients
just to make the sauce base and then
I'll show you everything else as we go
along what I have here is some tomato
sauce and also some tomatoes that I can
with some chilies in them you can see
the chili seeds but if you don't have
that you can always buy diced tomatoes
with chilies you don't have to make them
yourself diced onions I like to add
black beans to mine or have to but I
like it I've got some chipotle chili
powder which i think is really important
because it gives you a lovely smoky heat

necessary because I'm using the peppers
